languages.text: {n}Джай деловито пересчитывает невесть откуда взявшиеся в ваших покоях сокровища.{/n} "Шерин, я решила, что будет правильно все это вам вернуть. Сколь бы ни был приятен и ценен дар, он обратится каменной ношей на сердце, когда получен при помощи обмана".

{n}Jae is briskly counting the treasures that have suddenly appeared in your chambers.{/n} "Shereen, I decided that it is only right if I return all of this to you. No matter how lovely and valuable a gift may be, it becomes a millstone around the heart when it is obtained by deceitful means."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай деловито пересчитывает невесть откуда взявшиеся в ваших покоях сокровища.{/n} "Шерин, я решила, что будет правильно все это вам вернуть. Сколь бы ни был приятен и ценен дар, он обратится каменной ношей на сердце, когда получен при помощи обмана".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae is briskly counting the treasures that have suddenly appeared in your chambers.{/n} "Shereen, I decided that it is only right if I return all of this to you. No matter how lovely and valuable a gift may be, it becomes a millstone around the heart when it is obtained by deceitful means."

{n}Jae is briskly counting the treasures that have suddenly appeared in your chambers.{/n} "Shereen, I decided that it is only right if I return all of this to you. No matter how lovely and valuable a gift may be, it becomes a millstone around the heart when it is obtained by deceitful means."

{n}Jae is briskly counting the treasures that have suddenly appeared in your chambers.{/n} "Shereen, I decided that it is only right if I return all of this to you. No matter how lovely and valuable a gift may be, it becomes a millstone around the heart when it is obtained by deceitful means."

{n}Jae is briskly counting the treasures that have suddenly appeared in your chambers.{/n} "Shereen, I decided that it is only right if I return all of this to you. No matter how lovely and valuable a gift may be, it becomes a millstone around the heart when it is obtained by deceitful means."

languages.text: {n}婕伊正在步履轻盈地清点着你房间中的珍宝。这些珠宝不知是从哪里冒出来的，此刻都堆在你的房间里。{/n}“亲爱的，我认为我应该把这一切财富都还给你。哪怕是再贵重、再讨人喜爱的礼物，如果是通过欺骗手段得来，它也只会像石头一样压在你心里。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is briskly counting the treasures that have suddenly appeared in your chambers.{/n} "Shereen, I decided that it is only right if I return all of this to you. No matter how lovely and valuable a gift may be, it becomes a millstone around the heart when it is obtained by deceitful means."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊正在步履轻盈地清点着你房间中的珍宝。这些珠宝不知是从哪里冒出来的，此刻都堆在你的房间里。{/n}“亲爱的，我认为我应该把这一切财富都还给你。哪怕是再贵重、再讨人喜爱的礼物，如果是通过欺骗手段得来，它也只会像石头一样压在你心里。”

languages.text: {n}あなたの部屋に突然現れた財宝を、ジェイはキビキビと数えている。{/n}「シェリーン、アタシはこれをすべてあなたにお返しするのが正しいと考えたんだ。どんなに素敵で貴重な贈り物であっても、欺瞞に満ちた手段で手に入れたものであれば、それは心の重石となるだろうから」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is briskly counting the treasures that have suddenly appeared in your chambers.{/n} "Shereen, I decided that it is only right if I return all of this to you. No matter how lovely and valuable a gift may be, it becomes a millstone around the heart when it is obtained by deceitful means."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの部屋に突然現れた財宝を、ジェイはキビキビと数えている。{/n}「シェリーン、アタシはこれをすべてあなたにお返しするのが正しいと考えたんだ。どんなに素敵で貴重な贈り物であっても、欺瞞に満ちた手段で手に入れたものであれば、それは心の重石となるだろうから」

languages.text: {n}Jae revisa enérgicamente los tesoros que han aparecido de repente en tus aposentos.{/n} «Shereen, he decidido que lo justo es devolverte todo esto. Por muy valioso y considerado que sea un regalo, se convierte en un lastre para el corazón si se ha obtenido por medios ilícitos».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is briskly counting the treasures that have suddenly appeared in your chambers.{/n} "Shereen, I decided that it is only right if I return all of this to you. No matter how lovely and valuable a gift may be, it becomes a millstone around the heart when it is obtained by deceitful means."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae revisa enérgicamente los tesoros que han aparecido de repente en tus aposentos.{/n} «Shereen, he decidido que lo justo es devolverte todo esto. Por muy valioso y considerado que sea un regalo, se convierte en un lastre para el corazón si se ha obtenido por medios ilícitos».

languages.text: {n}Jae compte rapidement les trésors qui ont fait une apparition soudaine dans vos quartiers.{/n} « Shereen, j'ai décidé que la meilleure chose à faire, c'était de vous rapporter tout ça. Aussi précieux et charmant soit-il, un cadeau finit par peser sur le cœur lorsqu'il est obtenu par la tromperie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is briskly counting the treasures that have suddenly appeared in your chambers.{/n} "Shereen, I decided that it is only right if I return all of this to you. No matter how lovely and valuable a gift may be, it becomes a millstone around the heart when it is obtained by deceitful means."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae compte rapidement les trésors qui ont fait une apparition soudaine dans vos quartiers.{/n} « Shereen, j'ai décidé que la meilleure chose à faire, c'était de vous rapporter tout ça. Aussi précieux et charmant soit-il, un cadeau finit par peser sur le cœur lorsqu'il est obtenu par la tromperie. »

languages.text: {n}Jae zählt rege die Schätze, die plötzlich in deinen Gemächern aufgetaucht sind.{/n} "Shereen, ich habe beschlossen, dass es nur gerecht ist, wenn ich Euch das alles zurückbringe. Egal wie wunderbar und wertvoll ein Geschenk auch sein mag, es wird zu einem Klotz ums Herz, wenn es auf unehrliche Weise erhalten wird."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is briskly counting the treasures that have suddenly appeared in your chambers.{/n} "Shereen, I decided that it is only right if I return all of this to you. No matter how lovely and valuable a gift may be, it becomes a millstone around the heart when it is obtained by deceitful means."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae zählt rege die Schätze, die plötzlich in deinen Gemächern aufgetaucht sind.{/n} "Shereen, ich habe beschlossen, dass es nur gerecht ist, wenn ich Euch das alles zurückbringe. Egal wie wunderbar und wertvoll ein Geschenk auch sein mag, es wird zu einem Klotz ums Herz, wenn es auf unehrliche Weise erhalten wird."

languages.text: {n}Jae, odanda birdenbire ortaya çıkan hazineleri hızlıca sayıyor.{/n} "Şirinim, doğru olan şeyin, bütün bunları sana geri vermek olduğuna karar verdim. Bir armağan ne kadar hoş ve ne kadar değerli olursa olsun, aldatmacayla elde edildiğinde kalbimde bir yük hâline geliyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is briskly counting the treasures that have suddenly appeared in your chambers.{/n} "Shereen, I decided that it is only right if I return all of this to you. No matter how lovely and valuable a gift may be, it becomes a millstone around the heart when it is obtained by deceitful means."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, odanda birdenbire ortaya çıkan hazineleri hızlıca sayıyor.{/n} "Şirinim, doğru olan şeyin, bütün bunları sana geri vermek olduğuna karar verdim. Bir armağan ne kadar hoş ve ne kadar değerli olursa olsun, aldatmacayla elde edildiğinde kalbimde bir yük hâline geliyor."
